EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_Omni-channelRetailE-Book_Q114.Nurture #2: Drive Conversions Handout
EmailTemplate.subject: Driving Conversions with Mobile Apps: Following up on the Omnichannel eBook You Downloaded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You've read about how to adopt an omni-channel strategy into your business. But what are your next steps for actually driving conversions?
Our brief guide, "Drive Conversions With Mobile Apps," gives an overview of what your next steps should.
Get the guide here <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL_Handout_Drive_Conversions_with_Mobile_Apps.pdf>.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
